Helper Classes

Breathers

Breathers add an additional margin below an element.

.breather

15px margin

Some example Text

Some example Text

<p>Some example Text</p>
<div class="breather"></div>
<p>Some example Text</p>
.breather-lg

60px margin

Some example Text

Some example Text

<p>Some example Text</p>
<div class="breather-lg"></div>
<p>Some example Text</p>

Misc

.ruled

Creates a grey bottom border on any element

h3.ruled

<h3 class="ruled">h3.ruled</h3>
.border-left

Creates a left border on any element


<div class="border-left">
	<br />
</div>
.border-right

Creates a right border on any element


<div class="border-right">
	<br />
</div>
